alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 20 at 12:01AM MST until August 20 at 4:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 400 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Running washes flowing over unbridged crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1201 AM MST, Upstream gauge reports indicated flow in Delaney Wash moving into the Advisory area. Centennial Wash will also be running. - Delaney Wash and Centennial Wash is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional washes include... Dickey Wash, Winters Wash, Arlington Canal, Enterprise Canal, and Fourmile Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wintersburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
